disclaimer.title: Trading Disclaimer
disclaimer.highRiskWarning: Binary options trading involves substantial risk of loss and is not suitable for all investors. You should carefully consider whether trading is appropriate for you in light of your circumstances, knowledge, and financial resources.
disclaimer.noGuaranteeText: There is no guarantee that you will always win or make profits from binary options trading. Past performance does not guarantee future results.
disclaimer.riskOfLossText: You may lose some or all of your invested capital. Binary options trading carries a high risk of losing money rapidly due to leverage.
disclaimer.informationOnlyText: This application provides information and guidance for binary options trading only. It does not constitute financial advice, investment recommendations, or trading signals.
disclaimer.investResponsiblyText: Only invest money that you can afford to lose completely. Never invest money that you need for essential expenses or cannot afford to lose.
disclaimer.educationalPurposeText: This application is designed for educational and informational purposes only. It is not intended to provide specific investment advice or recommendations.
disclaimer.noFinancialAdviceText: The information provided should not be considered as financial, investment, or trading advice. Always consult with a qualified financial advisor before making investment decisions.
disclaimer.marketRisksText: Financial markets are volatile and unpredictable. Market conditions can change rapidly, and there is always a risk of significant financial loss.
disclaimer.technicalLimitationsText: While we strive to provide accurate information, technical issues, data delays, or system failures may occur. We do not guarantee the accuracy, completeness, or timeliness of any information provided.
disclaimer.regulatoryComplianceText: Binary options trading may be restricted or prohibited in your jurisdiction. It is your responsibility to ensure compliance with local laws and regulations.
disclaimer.responsibility1: Conduct your own research and due diligence before making any trading decisions
disclaimer.responsibility2: Understand the risks involved in binary options trading
disclaimer.responsibility3: Only trade with money you can afford to lose
disclaimer.responsibility4: Monitor your positions and manage your risk appropriately
disclaimer.responsibility5: Seek professional financial advice if needed
disclaimer.responsibility6: Comply with all applicable laws and regulations in your jurisdiction
disclaimer.finalWarningText: By using this application, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to these disclaimers. You understand the risks involved and accept full responsibility for your trading decisions and their consequences.
disclaimer.contactText: If you have any questions about these disclaimers, please contact us before using the application.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introductionText: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our binary options trading application. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal data.
privacy.personalInformationText: Name, email address, phone number, and other identifying information you provide during registration.
privacy.usageDataText: Information about how you interact with our application, including pages visited, features used, and time spent.
privacy.tradingDataText: Your trading history, positions, balances, and other financial information related to your trading activities.
privacy.deviceInformationText: Device type, operating system, browser information, IP address, and other technical data.
privacy.use1: Provide and maintain our trading services
privacy.use2: Process your trading transactions and manage your account
privacy.use3: Send you important updates and notifications about your account
privacy.use4: Improve our application and develop new features
privacy.use5: Comply with legal and regulatory requirements
privacy.use6: Protect against fraud and ensure platform security
privacy.securityMeasuresText: We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits to protect your data.
privacy.dataRetentionText: We retain your personal information only as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations.
privacy.right1: Access your personal data we hold about you
privacy.right2: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
privacy.right3: Request deletion of your personal data
privacy.right4: Object to processing of your personal data
privacy.right5: Request data portability to another service
privacy.right6: Withdraw consent for data processing at any time
privacy.contactText: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your personal information, please contact us at privacy@yourapp.com
privacy.policyUpdates: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
